content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Present Continuous
Present tense of 'to be' + present participle
I am going, You are going
Example: I am going to buy a book
They are talking

content.title: Conversation
table: Sepand: Hi Shahla, how are you?
Sepand: Not bad. What do you want to do?
سپند: بد نیستم. چه کار می‌خواهی بکنی؟
Shahla: I'm hungry. I'd like to eat something.
شهلا: گرسنه هستم. می‌خواهم چیزی بخورم.
Sepand: Where do you want to go?
Shahla: I'd like to go to an Iranian restaurant.
شهلا: می‌خواهم بروم به یک رستوران ایرانی.

content.title: Grammar
content.description:
Present Subjunctive
Conditional word (maybe, should, if, etc.) + Infinitive
Maybe I'll go.
He should study.

content.title: Conversation
table: Would you like to go out for a meal?
دوست دارید برای غذا برویم بیرون؟
I enjoyed myself today, thank you.
امروز به من خوش گذشت، مرسی.
Would you like to go for a drink?

content.title: Reading
content.description: Ms.Ahmadi is an accountant. She must wake up early and go to work, so that she can feed her children. On fridays, Lady Ahmadi takes her children to a restaurant. The children likes kebab very much. They order kebab every time they go to the restaurant.
